messages.content:
NAME: Jayesh Krishna
EMAIL: 210020058@iitb.ac.in
PHONE: 91)8291174256

FULL RESUME:
Jayesh Krishna Prasad 210020058
Chemical Engineering (B.Tech.) Gender: Male
Indian Institute of Technology Bombay DOB: 18/06/2003
Email: 210020058@iitb.ac.in Contact: (+91)8291174256
Examination University Institute Year CPI / %
Graduation IIT Bombay IIT Bombay 2025 8.96
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
ZENNiX | Product Intern [Feb’24-March’24]
 Spearheaded market research, identified top-tier manufacturers, resulting in a 20% increase in product quality assurance
 Identified over 60 trending products and furnished detailed reports that led to increase in the selection efficiency by 2%
 Optimized e-commerce product selection leading to 5% reduction in time-to-market and a 7% decrease in sourcing costs
OIL AND NATURAL GAS CORPORATION LTD. | Process Engineer [Dec’23-Jan’24]
 Evaluated the application of Predictive Analysis-based maintenance solutions and monitored sensors to identify faults
 Conducted on-site visits, ensured zero false negatives and achieved a 75%+ accuracy in Root Cause Failure Analysis
 Proposed measures to enhance operational efficiency and prepared detailed report on the key performance indicators
ZIGSAW | Business Development Intern [Dec’22-Jan’23]
 Partnered closely with the founder’s office for business planning resulting in notable 20% increase in conversion rates
 Participated in team meetings, contributed innovative ideas and strategic insights that generated a 7% growth trajectory
 Implemented market research within lead generation processes, facilitating a 3% expansion in the company’s client base
POSITIONS OF RESPONSIBILITY
OVERALL COORDINATOR | Department Academic Mentorship Program, IIT Bombay [Mar’24-Present]
Heading the Student Mentor Program for the Department of Chemical Engineering
 Handpicked a team of 45 student mentors from 120+ applicants based on SOPs, extensive interviews and peer reviews
 Spearheading a 3-tier team and representing 800+ students in the Department UG Committee to address their concerns
 Appointed by the HoD to the DUGC senate, influencing policy and curriculum development as the student representative
STUDENT MENTOR | Student Mentorship Program, IIT Bombay [May’23-Present]
Selected amongst 43 out of 110+ applicants based on extensive interviews and peer reviews
 Mentoring 6 sophomores, maintaining departmental resources, research blogs and promoting student-faculty interaction
KEY PROJECTS
STOCK MARKET ANALYSIS | Fin-Search | Finance Club [July’23-Aug’23]
 Examined factors behind the Vodafone-Idea merger decline, and identified causes that led to a loss in the market share
 Assessed Spice Jet's revival from bankruptcy and examined Facebook's acquisitions and their impact on the valuations
TECHNICAL V/S FUNDAMENTAL ANALYSIS | Fin-Search | Finance Club [June’22-July’22]
 Examined the profitability of technical and fundamental analysis on the stock price of JSW Steel in different timezones
 Concluded the stock price to be undervalued with a discount of 7.4% by estimating the intrinsic value using DCF analysis
ML BASED SCREENING OF ALLOY CATALYSTS | Guide: Prof. Ojus Mohan [Aug’23-Present]
 Developing a novel ML algorithm to enhance high-entropy alloy catalysts for selective CO2 hydrogenation to methanol
 Performing data analysis, multiscale modeling, feature engineering, and micro-kinetics to enhance catalyst prediction
SUPPLY CHAIN OPTIMISATION THROUGH ML MODELS | Seasons of Code [Dec’23-Present]
 Applied ML and advanced Pyomo models to optimize key supply chain sectors and achieved substantial cost reduction
 Solved intricate optimization problems, improved supply chain performance in all 4 modes of transport of raw material
IMAGE CARTOONIFIER | Seasons of Code [May’23-July’23]
 Implemented TensorFlow and Keras for neural network, applied ML algorithms for image processing with OpenCV/GIMP
SCHOLASTIC ACHIEVEMENTS
 Attained 98.6 percentile in JEE Advanced among 0.15M+ and 99.66 percentile in JEE Main out of 1.2M+ applicants [‘21]
 Secured 2nd rank by presenting development alternatives on "Make in India" at Indian Institute of Geomagnetism [‘19]
EXTRA-CURRICULAR ACTIVITIES
Certifications  Accounting fundamentals | CFI • Introduction to Corporate Finance | Coursera
 Built a DCF model to predict BMW's 5-year financial reports using available accounting statements
Sports  Represented Zone Gujarat & Maharashtra, securing 1st rank in Inter School Chess Nationals, 2017
 Part of the Inter-IIT Chess team of IIT Bombay and attended camp trials for Tennis and Football
Technical  HTML, C++, Python, MATLAB, Excel, Powerpoint, Word, VASP, Fortran, AutoCAD, OpenFOAM
Miscellaneous  Led a team of 4 in providing ingenious solutions to Thyssenkrupp Uhde India Pvt. Ltd. on an RCG
loop in Innovation Pavilion, organised by the Ministry of Chemicals and Fertilizers.
